page.title: 16WHERE I LIVE
page.content: I LIVE IN MAES-Y-DRE ROAD,WREXHAM. IT IS THE LARGEST TOWN IN NORTH WALES AND THE POPULATION IS ABOUT 50,000. MY TOWN HAS GOT A GOOD SHOPPING CENTRE AND A LARGE COVERED INDOOR MARKET. IT ALSO HAS A LARGE BEAST MARKET AND A CATTLE MARKET. THEY BOTH COME ONCE A WEEK. WREXHAM IS SURROUNDED BY FARMS AND COALMINES AND IT HAS GOT A GOOD TOURIST CENTRE FOR CHESTER,SNOWDONIA AND THE NORTH WALES COAST. WREXHAM HAS ALSO GOT SEVERAL LARGE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS,A LARGE MODERN SWIMMING POOL,A GOOD LIBRARY,TWO CINEMAS,AN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE AND A VERY LARGE AND VERY MODERN POLICE BLOCK.
